185373132.review: What can I say, in the last few months I've played this game more than any sane person ever could. And through it all, the moments of both glory and abject failure, I can honestly say I've found a new appreciation for BTD5 as a whole. There is nearly an endless amount of challenge and entertainment packed into this simple game, and as much as BTD6 managed to improve, the 5th game isn't worth forgetting.

185180477.review: I enjoy the game even though i suffer sometimes 👍

185126626.review:
Long time Bloons player here, After intially playing the intial flash games, BTD5 is just a straight up ultimate edition of all those with lots of maps and lots of content, when i mean lots, i mean lots and lots of maps with different modes. 

Like:
Map variety
Towers
Random & Special Missions

Dislike:
May feel monotonous if trying to 100% the game and the in game currency, once everything is purchased is of little use apart from reviving a lost game.

Highly recommended for Tower Defense games fans. Have a popstatic time!

184296448.review: This game did not disappoint. The first game from NK that I've ever played was btd battles, and this game is very similar. You also have the same freedom to choose the difficulty and map, just like btd 6. The graphics were super nostalgic and I love that they still update this game. NK, you are my favorite company of video games, especially because your slogan is more awesomer. Thank you so much for everything you have done for the boons community.

183676929.review:
from even my first hours, btd5 is much better (hunderds of hours of experience on btd6 (epic games and mobile sorry)
TW: YAPPING

btd6:
- costs more to play
- relies on internet to do literally anything
- has mr beast collab
- no NAPSFRILLS
- ugly 3d monkeys
btd5:
- invented NAPSFRILLS
- chad soundtrack
- classic btd skins
- tokens and monkey money used instead of real money
- more maps
- more to do after black bordering maps (mastery mode)
- lets you play offline
- is still frequently updated after 13 years
- silly 2d art style
- cooler maps
- cheaper to buy on steam and everywhere else
- 2x cash is bought with monkey money
- bloonchipper
btd5 is just the best one
